items.name: accordion
items.title: Accordion
items.description: The `Accordion` component allows you to toggle the visibility of content sections. It is useful for FAQs, menus, and more.

items.name: spinning-text
items.title: SpinningText
items.description: The `SpinningText` component is a dynamic and visually engaging UI element that animates text in a circular spinning motion. It is highly customizable, allowing you to control the animation's speed, direction, radius, and more.

items.name: bubble-up-button
items.title: BubbleUpButton
items.description: The `BubbleUpButton` component provides an interactive button with a fluid "bubble-up" animation effect when hovered. It creates an engaging user experience with minimal effort.

items.name: marquee
items.title: Marquee
items.description: The `Marquee` component is a versatile UI element that creates a scrolling marquee effect. It is highly customizable and can adapt to various use cases, such as displaying text or other content in a continuous loop.

items.name: ripple-button
items.title: RippleButton
items.description: An interactive button with a ripple effect for modern UIs.

items.name: vertical-tab
items.title: VerticalTab
items.description: The `VerticalTab` component is a versatile and interactive UI element designed for creating vertical tabbed navigation. It provides a smooth user experience with dynamic indicator transitions and customizable styles.

items.name: expandable-tabs
items.title: ExpandableTabs
items.description: The `ExpandableTabs` component is a dynamic and interactive UI element designed for creating horizontal tabbed navigation.

items.name: link-preview
items.title: LinkPreview
items.description: The `LinkPreview` component is an interactive UI element that displays a preview of a link when hovered over. It enhances user experience by providing additional context about the link.

items.name: stagger-text
items.title: StaggerText
items.description: A text component with staggered animation.
